TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Academy: Special Broadcast with astronaut Tom Jones!

Articles.Content:
Tonight DasValdez will be hosting a very Kerbal Space Academy on Twitch, because none other than former astronaut Tom Jones will be joining him live! The show starts at 6PM Eastern Time / 22:00 UTC.

Tom Jones completed four space shuttle flights: STS-59, STS-68, STS-80 and STS-98, meaning he was involved in the maintenance on the Hubble Space Telescope and visited the International Space Station!

Don’t miss it!

<iframe src="http://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="378" width="620"></iframe>[http://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez?tt_medium=live_embed&tt_content=text_link](<a%20href=)" style="padding:2px 0px 4px; display:block; width:345px; font-weight:normal; font-size:10px;text-decoration:underline;">Watch live video from DasValdez on www.twitch.tv

Ahhh im not sure i will be able to watch it ! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Will it be possible to watch it later, after the stream is finished ?
Yeah. Can this stream be recorded for later viewing? It will be tad late for players from Europe.
I think twitch.tv saves the stream for re-watching...it's how I've caught up with SQUADcasts in the past when I wasn't able to make the 6:30 CDT start time.
